title: Updating Champion Informations
body: A lot of the champion informations on Riot's website is really old/incorrect/improperly typed. There are some pages that say 0 base damage, some show the old abilities of reworked champions, and some even say (+Attack Damage)(+Attack Damage) when it should be ability power. Is someone planning to fix this soon? There are so many outside resources that are up to date, I'm confused as to why the game's page isn't.
